placeDetails.name: Hotel Le Walt
placeDetails.description:
See why so many travelers make Hotel Le Walt their hotel of choice when visiting Paris. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Nearby landmarks such as Louvre Museum (1.4 mi) and Arc de Triomphe (1.4 mi) make Hotel Le Walt a great place to stay when visiting Paris.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service while staying at Hotel Le Walt. In addition, Hotel Le Walt offers breakfast, which will help make your Paris trip additionally gratifying.
While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the French restaurants, including 58 Tour Eiffel, Le Bouillon Chartier, and Le Jules Verne, all of which are a short distance from Hotel Le Walt.
If you’re looking for something to do, Eiffel Tower (0.6 mi), Musée d'Orsay (1.0 mi), and Champs-Elysees (1.0 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Hotel Le Walt.
At Hotel Le Walt, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Paris.

address_obj.address_string: 37 avenue de la Motte Picquet 7 Arr., 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel La Comtesse
placeDetails.description:
Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Paris does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel La Comtesse, a nice option for travelers like you.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Hotel La Comtesse features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. In addition, as a valued Hotel La Comtesse guest, you can enjoy a fitness center and breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Paris, Hotel La Comtesse is located a short distance from Louvre Museum (1.4 mi) and Arc de Triomphe (1.5 mi).
While in Paris, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel La Comtesse, including 58 Tour Eiffel (0.7 mi), Le Jules Verne (0.6 mi), and L'Avenue (0.9 mi).
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Eiffel Tower (0.6 mi), Musée d'Orsay (1.0 mi), and Champs-Elysees (1.1 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Hotel La Comtesse puts the best of Paris at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

placeDetails.name: Mercure Paris Centre Eiffel Tower Hotel
Hotel Ares Paris
placeDetails.description: This sophisticated hotel is a 3-minute walk from both La Motte-Picquet - Grenelle metro station and the Swiss Village - Antique and Art Galleries. It's also a 12-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. The richly decorated, traditional rooms feature plush furnishings and bathrooms with designer tiles, plus free Wi-Fi, mini-bars, and flat-screen TVs. Upgraded rooms add living areas; junior suites offer Eiffel Tower views. Breakfast comes free, and the hotel can arrange moped/bike rentals. Other amenities include 2 refined, individually styled lounges.

address_obj.address_string: 7, rue du General de Larminat, 75015 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel La Bourdonnais by Inwood Hotels
placeDetails.description:
See why so many travelers make Hotel La Bourdonnais their hotel of choice when visiting Paris. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Rooms at Hotel De La Bourdonnais offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A lounge will also help to make your stay even more special.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Arc de Triomphe (1.4 mi) and Louvre Museum (1.5 mi), guests of Hotel De La Bourdonnais can easily experience some of Paris' most well known attractions.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Paris' popular crab restaurants such as L'Avenue, Les Ombres, and L'Avant Comptoir, all a short distance from Hotel La Bourdonnais.
Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular natural history museums, such as Galeries d'Anatomie Comparée et de Paléontologie and Musee de l'Homme.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel La Bourdonnais as you experience all of the things Paris has to offer.

address_obj.address_string: 111 avenue de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Royal Phare Hotel
placeDetails.description:
Royal Phare Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Paris, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Arc de Triomphe (1.4 mi) and Louvre Museum (1.4 mi), guests of Royal Phare Hotel can easily experience some of Paris' most well known attractions.
Hotel Royal Phare is a hotel offering a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and newspaper. Plus, guests can enjoy breakfast buffet, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Paris. For guests with a vehicle, there is paid public parking available nearby.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Paris' popular crab restaurants such as L'Avenue, Les Ombres, and L'Avant Comptoir, all a short distance from Royal Phare Hotel.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Eiffel Tower (0.6 mi), Musée d'Orsay (1.0 mi), and Champs-Elysees (1.0 mi), which are some popular Paris attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
Enjoy your stay in Paris!

address_obj.address_string: 40 Avenue de la Motte Picquet, 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel Le Cercle - Tour Eiffel
placeDetails.description: Hôtel Le Cercle - Tour Eiffel ★★★ , completely renovated in 2020, offers you a warm welcome to the seventh arrondissement of Paris, one of the Capital's liveliest residential neighborhoods. The Eiffel Tower and the Champ de Mars are just steps away, and the École Militaire lies before you. Located in the prestigious avenue de la Bourdonnais, Le Cercle retains the intimacy and poetry of a Parisian home. In its chic and contemporary decor, our elegant hotel invites you to unwind in the refinement of typical Parisian houses. Located adjacent to the Eiffel Tower, the Champ de Mars, and the École Militaire, the Hôtel Le Cercle E boasts an ideal location from which to explore Paris. Countless must-see tourist attractions await, just minutes away on foot or by public transportation (from the École Militaire Métro/bus station): the Hôtel des Invalides, the Trocadéro Esplanade, the Alexandre III bridge, the Grand Palais, the Champs-Élysées shopping district and the Arc de Triomphe, the neighborhood of Saint-Germain-des-Prés, the Rodin Museum, the Quai Branly Museum, the Musée d'Orsay, the Garnier Opera House, the Montparnasse Tower, the Louvre… Right next to the Hotel Le Cercle, the Rue Cler offers you the opportunity to immerse yourself in the daily life of the neighborhood and its residents. This famous street is a favorite destination of true Parisian gourmets. On this lively, traditional, pedestrian street, you'll find exceptional food purveyors, many cafés and restaurants, wine merchants, delicatessens, master chocolatiers and pastry chefs, and more.

address_obj.address_string: 117 avenue de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel Le Marquis By Inwood Hotels
placeDetails.description:
Everyone needs a cozy cocoon to rest in. Hotel Le Marquis is the perfect establishment for travelers looking to recharge during their stay in Paris. Renowned for its charming setting and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hotel Le Marquis allows you to fully enjoy the best that Paris has to offer.

During your stay, Hotel Le Marquis offers you a 24-hour front desk, concierge service, and room service. Additionally, Hotel Le Marquis features a lounge, providing the ideal place to relax after a busy day exploring the streets of Paris. And a significant advantage, parking is available.

Located not far from landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower (0.8 km) and Trocadéro (1.3 km), Hotel Le Marquis is perfect for discovering the various attractions of Paris.

Whether you're on a business trip, leisure trip, or both, Hotel Le Marquis will make your stay in Paris unforgettable.
